mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON S.STAY_KIND = C.C_KIND LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(ROOM_PRICE) AS MIN_PRICE, STAY_NO FROM T2_ROOM_TBL GROUP BY STAY_NO ) R ON S.STAY_NO = R.STAY_NO WHERE S.STAY_KIND = 'HOTEL'
SELECT * FROM T2_ROOM_TBL WHERE STAY_NO = #{stayNo} AND ROOM_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON S.STAY_KIND = C.C_KIND WHERE STAY_NO = #{stayNo} AND S_DELYN = 'N'
